ticket.title: stop_revoke semantics: guarantee cancellation progress under load while still enforcing RFC-0028/0029 (explicit policy)

in_scope: Define explicit policy for stop_revoke jobs:
- still require valid RFC-0028 token (no unauth cancel)
- RFC-0029 admission: policy may allow a reserved lane share for stop_revoke to avoid deadlock
- stop_revoke executes even when queue is congested (anti-starvation)
Record explicit stop_revoke admission trace in receipts.

steps: Add economics lane reservation for stop_revoke.
Add worker logic to prioritize cancellation safely.

criteria: Cancellation is reliable under heavy load without opening a bypass for unauthorized actuation.
